Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 51st overall pick, by St. Louis in 2008...
Injured on 4/15/2011 with a Bruised Hand, out for 2 days...
Traded from St. Louis to Tampa Bay on 4/1/2012 (Going to TB: CF K. Nieuwenhuis, C J. Arencibia. Going to STL: SS Y. Escobar)...
Had first career hit on 4/9/2013, off Brett Myers (BAL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/10/2013, off Jay Jackson (BAL)...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 2013, hitting .265 with 17 HR, 82 RBI...
Won Gold Glove Award at Leftfield in 2013...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against New York (A) on 8/10/2016...
Hit for the cycle against Los Angeles (A) on 5/2/2017...
Traded from Tampa Bay to Chicago (A) on 2/4/2018 (Going to CHA: LF K. Nieuwenhuis. Going to TB: RF P. Bourjos)...
Won Player of the Week award on 10/1/2018, hitting .478 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
Won Gold Glove Award at Leftfield in 2018...
Traded from Chicago (A) to Houston on 7/18/2020 (Going to CHA: P R. Ramires, P L. Warneke Jr.. Going to HOU: LF K. Nieuwenhuis)...
Signed as a free agent by Minnesota on 2/13/2022 to a 3-year deal worth $4,000,000 per year...
Drove in 8 runs against Kansas City on 5/26/2022...
Was selected to the 2022 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/19/2022, hitting .438 with 1 HR, 4 RBI...
